preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This guide describes how to configure, operate, and manage Gluster File System (GlusterFS).

section.title: Audience
section.para: This guide is intended for Systems Administrators interested in configuring and managing GlusterFS.
This guide assumes that you are familiar with the Linux operating system, concepts of File System, GlusterFS concepts, and GlusterFS Installation
